title: Pieter Delobelle
subtitle: Hi. I'm a PhD researcher at KU Leuven working on large language models, specifically Dutch resources (see RobBERT), fairness in NLP and alignment problems with LLMs.
contact: I am open to collaborations: just ping me on X/Twitter or email me.
RSS_subtitle: My blog about my research on AI, verification and NLP. Currently working at DTAI lab in the KU Leuven.
